CANNOT_READ_BLOCKED_TXT - Static variable in class com.hac.Exception.ErrorMessages
Represents an error message that occurs when the program cannot read the 'blocked.txt' file.
CANNOT_WRITE_BLOCKED_TXT - Static variable in class com.hac.Exception.ErrorMessages
Represents an error message that occurs when the program cannot write to the 'blocked.txt' file.
CANNOT_WRITE_OUTPUT_FILE - Static variable in class com.hac.Exception.ErrorMessages
Represents an error message that occurs when the program cannot write output to a file.

Command - Interface in com.hac.Command
The Command interface represents a command that can be executed by the command-line tool.

The command key for the parse Command Line in the Map.

CookieBlocker - Class in com.hac.Blocker
The CookieBlocker class extends BlockerDecorator and implements the BlockerCommand interface, providing a URL blocking mechanism by checking for the presence of cookies in the response header.
